HELLO, I AM OSCAR

This is a blog. It's my attempt to make a small contribution to the cool stuff that is floating around the internet. But for the most part this will be where I put some of the things I learn or come across into writing just to document. For this pre-phase I will most likely blog about how I improve this site.

Recent Blog Posts

  • First Blog Post with Jekyll

    Published 18 March 2014

    So as the title explains, this is my first blog post with Jekyll. My first impression so far is really good. This is an awesome tool for generating a blog, and it's really easy to deploy with Github Pages. This is just my "Hello World!" post, so in a while I will create a post of how I set up Jekyll with Github Pages.
